item.title: Archive.today
item.description:
Archive.today is a simple tool for accessing snapshots of web pages — useful when a site is behind a paywall, taken down, or modified.

Paste any URL into https://archive.today to view an archived version of the page.

Benefits:

  • Bypasses many paywalls and subscription overlays
  • Preserves content that may later be deleted or edited
  • Useful for citation, research, and saving references

No login needed. No extensions. Just a direct snapshot of the web as it was.

item.title: Discord Interface Zoom
item.description:
Just a quick note — after every update, my zoom level preferences in Discord get reset to default. Annoying, right? What makes it even worse is that the desktop app doesn’t have a zoom slider for DPI adjustments.

So, every time this happens, I find myself Ecosiyng (because who needs Google anymore?) the same thing over and over. Turns out, the fix is super simple:

Just use:

  • Ctrl + "+" to zoom in
  • Ctrl + "-" to zoom out

That’s it. No hidden settings or complicated tweaks. Simple as that!

item.title: MangoHud
item.description:
Overlay for monitoring FPS, frame times, GPU usage, etc., in-game.

Install MangoHud:

1

sudo pacman -S mangohud

Enable MangoHud in Steam:

Go to Game Properties → Launch Options and add:

1

MANGOHUD=1 %command%

Limit FPS to 60:

1

MANGOHUD_CONFIG=fps_limit=60 %command%
